Title: New Balance Unisex Made in USA 990v6 Black
Description:
Unisex Lifestyle Running Shoes
MADE/Responsive Cushioning/Stability
Colors: Black
Components: All-day comfort with Ortholite cushioning insert
Properties: Reflective accents designed to catch the light
Outsole: Ndurance° rubber compound for maximum outsole durability
Upper: Pig Suede/Mesh
Midsole: ENCAP midsole cushioning combines lightweight foam with a durable polyurethane rim to deliver all-day support
Drop: 12 mm drop - due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 12 mm drop are approximate
Previous: Style# M990BB5
Technology: FuelCell foam delivers a propulsive feel to help drive you forward
Other: TPU back tab
Standards: New Balance MADE contains a domestic value of 70% or more. MADE makes up a limited portion of New Balance's US sales
Closure: Lace-up closure for a secure fit

Title: Dunham 8000 Works Waterproof 8 Inch Plain Toe Wheat
Description:
Men's Safety & Work
Insulated/Waterproof/Slip Resistant/Stability
Colors: Wheat
Last: Padded collar and tongue reduce irritation while adding extra cushioning
Origin: Nylon shank offers stability and flexibility
Components: Slip-resistant, oil-resistant rubber outsole helps to keep you steady
Outsole: Removable footbed offers advanced comfort and cushioning, and accommodates your own orthotics as needed.
Upper: Thinsulate® 400g provides added warmth and comfort
Midsole: Seam-sealed waterproof construction and waterproof membrane help to keep your feet dry
Drop: RBar offers maximum stability
Previous: ESR-TESTER ANSI-Z41 PT99 helps to prevent electric shock hazards
Technology: ASTM F2913-19 and SATRA TM144 in Dry, Wet, Oil, Oil/Wet Conditions for slip-resistance
Other: Lace-up closure for a secure fit

Title: New Balance Made in US M990v5 Carbon
Description:
Men's Running Shoes
Made in USA/Cushioning/Stability
Colors: Carbon/Team Red/White
Components: All-day comfort with new Ortholite cushioning insert
Properties: Leather upper provides a snug fit for optimal comfort
Outsole: Blown rubber outsole
Upper: Leather/Mesh
Midsole: ENCAP midsole cushioning combines lightweight foam with a durable polyurethane rim to deliver all-day support
Drop: 12 mm drop: due to variances created during the development and manufacturing processes, all references to 12 mm drop are approximate
Previous: Style# M990v4
Technology: Dual density collar foam offers support and comfort for ankles
Other: ENCAP is a core of soft cushioning EVA in the midsole with a tough polyurethane rim for more support and durability
Standards: Manufactured in the US for over 75 years and representing a limited portion of our US sales. New Balance Made is a premium collection that contains a domestic value of 70% or greater
